cause.description:
Our purpose, through religious and educational activities, is to empower people to discern the things that make for peace - in ourselves, within families, in our global environment, between nations - and to advocate peace and justice, seeking the realization of God's will on earth as in heaven.
http://onearthpeace.org/
1. Nurturing spirit-filled discipleship and active response to violence.
2. Teaching and leading healthy, faithful responses to conflict.
3. Developing leadership for peace in each new generation.
cause.mission: On Earth Peace is a faith-based non-profit organization committed to promoting peace and justice through active nonviolence, and equipping local communities and leaders for this work.
cause.name: On Earth Peace
